PromptSection.message: Your scan is ready! Now, what would you like to find out?

prompts.first: Describe any abnormalities present in the lung fields
prompts.second: Evaluate the cardiac silhouette and mediastinum
prompts.third: Evaluate the bone structures for any lesions or fractures
prompts.fourth: Comment on the presence or absence of pleural effusions
